title: Louis Okoye
text:
is a <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> professional <a href="baseball">baseball</a> <a href="outfielder">outfielder</a> for the <a href="Tohoku%20Rakuten%20Golden%20Eagles">Tohoku Rakuten Golden Eagles</a> in <a href="Japan">Japan</a>'s <a href="Nippon%20Professional%20Baseball">Nippon Professional Baseball</a>.
After the 2017 season, he joined <a href="Ca%C3%B1eros%20de%20Los%20Mochis">Cañeros de Los Mochis</a>.
Okoye's mother is Japanese and his father is <a href="Igbo%20people">Igbo</a> from Nigeria. His younger sister <a href="Monica%20Okoye">Monica Okoye</a> is a member of the <a href="Japan%20women%27s%20national%20basketball%20team">Japan women's national basketball team</a> which won a silver medal at the <a href="Basketball%20at%20the%202020%20Summer%20Olympics">2020 Olympics in Tokyo</a>.
